name: Computer Tabs
description:
Heya there my hushpuppies (that's you all!), I'm Eaccoonger and welcome to my first project made with Bitsy! Expect a few more 8-Bit gamed from me in the future! Go from tab to tab on your computer as you complete the task each page has for you. But what each tab has waiting for you is a mystery...

To switch between tabs, move your avatar - or cursor - next to the blinking circle on the tab. Interacting with the blinking circle will give you the name of the page. If you want to end the game, click the little X on the upper right hand corner - that will be the equivalent of exiting out of your browser.

I hope you all enjoy!
